The automation is now stopped.
 To restart, please follow the following steps:
 - Bring all trains to their origin location.
 - Turn all route activation toggles OFF.
 - Then hit the RESET button on this tablet.
 Once the system is properly reset, turn the activation toggles to ON.

Are you sure you want to stop the automation?

THIS WILL STOP ALL THE AUTOMATED TRAINS IMMEDIATELY.
The automation is now resetting.\n Once this message disappears, turn the activation toggles to ON.

Are you sure you want to reset the automation?

- Are all trains at their origin location?
- Are all route activation toggles turned OFF?
